release_note: Stunning UI Overhaul: Dive into a refreshed visually captivating user interface that makes audio recording not just functional but a delight for the eyes! Enhanced User Experience: We ve fine tuned the way you interact with our app ensuring a smoother more intuitive journey from start to finish. Customizable Themes with Enhanced Control: Elevate your experience with our improved theme selection feature! While our previous version adapted to your iOS theme settings now you have the power to set your preferred theme dark or light independently within the app. Tailor the look of Audio Recorder App to match your personal style regardless of your device s settings. Bug Fixes Performance Improvements: We ve squashed some pesky bugs and turbocharged the app s performance for a seamless recording experience. Thank you for choosing Audio Recorder App! Your feedback is instrumental in our continuous effort to improve. If you re enjoying our app please take a moment to leave us a review in the App Store. Your support means the world to us!

Portuguese Italian Dictionary Simplified Portuguese Portuguese Portuguese Thank you for using Recorder App! If you have a moment to leave a review in the App Store we would really appreciate it.
Improvement and Bug fixes.

Improvement and Bug fixes. Live audio wave while recording. Convert to mp3 and m4a. Auto upload to Google Drive OneDrive and Dropbox. Restart Redo recording. Trimming option for trim original file and trim with create new file. Continue recording shortcut in playing screen. Default file name format option. iPhone spotlight search. 3D touch support Start Recording Search files .

Note: iOS 8 users don t update to this version Crash fixed for iOS 7 Users Added option for selecting Auto upload Dropbox folder Other minor fixes

Continue recording into existing recordings. Call Interruption handling Recording will continue after a call or other interruption. Enhancements in recording quality. Support for background uploads to clouds. Auto upload new recordings to Dropbox. iPhone 6 and 6 Plus UI enhancements. Other minor fixes in UI and functionalities. We hope that you enjoy the new stuff! Please rate Recorder App on the App Store.
iOS 8 Special iCloud Drive Import and Export Support Touch Id Lock iPhone 5s iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus users can use Touch Id lock Other bug fix

Biggest Update AIFF format support. Audio recording with high quality 24 bit 32 bit depth recording support. Reduced recording file size. Auto stop recording in specific time interval. Auto start and Manual start recording option. Set file name prefix like Meeting Lecture Podcast etc. Create Cloud folder shortcuts for easy upload files to clouds. Upload files to cloud in background mode. File info viewer Sample rate bit per sample audio channel etc . New video tutorial with sub titles. Bug fixes and improvements. Tascam iM2 iXY stereo microphone Bluetooth Headset etc. Improved audio processing Audio recording file size issue fixed File size up to 30 MB per hour Repeat audio setting Player Setting Evernote bug fixed Minor Bug Fixes and improvements Many thanks for your suggestions and feedbacks. iCloud Support New Clouds Sharing WebDav Server FTP Server Evernote Enhancements in the Existing Clouds Recording Interval Automatically recording interval based on the selected durations like 15 Min 30 Min 1 Hour etc. FTP File Sharing Over WiFi Connection Access Recorder App from your Computer Mac with FTP Share You can create Network Drive on your computer and can access Recorder App files without cable connection Settings to Show Hide Recent Folder Private Folder Music Library Folder iCloud Folder Trash Now you can move the useless recording to trash and can revoke it from trash if needed Setting for Enable Disable Auto Pause WiFi Share With Web Browser Protected with Username and Password Help Manual with Docs and Videos New Support Website Unlock Items issue resolved Other minor bug fixes Many Many Thanks for your suggestions and coordination.
